principles: Fusion over Imitation: Mix dashboard density with creative tool interactivity.
Emotion First: The user is an 'Architect of Intelligence'. Feel powerful, precise, and futuristic.
Content is King: The workflow logic is the hero. Everything else recedes.
Zoom In: Focus on the node details. High fidelity controls.
Negative Space: Don't clutter the canvas. Let the nodes breathe.

headings.usage: Page titles, Node headers, Modal titles

rules: Labels must be uppercase, text-xs, tracking-wider, and text-muted-foreground.
Line height: leading-none for headers, leading-relaxed for body.

nodes.style: Custom Node Component. Card-like container with header (icon + title) and body (inputs/outputs).

sidebar.content: Draggable node types (Agent, Loop, If/Else, Start, End).

config_panel.style: Slide-over sheet or persistent panel. Glassmorphism.

logs_panel.style: Collapsible terminal-like view. Monospace font. Darker background (#000000).

images.description: Abstract purple/blue neural network. Use for Empty State or Welcome Screen background with overlay.
Geometric mirror structure. Use for 'Processing' or 'Compiling' overlay states.

instructions_to_main_agent: INSTALLATION: Run 'yarn add reactflow framer-motion' immediately. These are missing.
SETUP: Add the Google Fonts links to public/index.html.
THEME: Ensure 'dark' class is applied to the html/body tag by default.
LAYOUT: Use 'react-resizable-panels' to create the 3-pane layout (Sidebar | Canvas | Config/Logs).
CANVAS: Implement React Flow with custom node types. Do not use default nodes.
STATE: Use a global store (Zustand or Context) to manage the workflow state (nodes, edges, execution status).
TESTING: Add data-testid to all buttons, inputs, and nodes (e.g., 'node-agent-1', 'btn-run-workflow').
LOGS: The logs panel should auto-scroll to bottom when new logs arrive.
ERROR HANDLING: If a node fails, highlight it in red and show a tooltip with the error.
UNIVERSAL_GUIDELINES_FOR_MAIN_AGENT: Dark colors look good when used independently without gradients. DO NOT use dark colors as gradients.
Don't make generic centered layouts, simplistic gradients, and uniform styling.
Create depth through layered design elements with z-index hierarchy.
Use glass-morphism effects with backdrop filters (12-24px blur).
You MUST NOT apply universal transition. Eg: 'transition: all'. This results in breaking transforms.
You MUST NOT center align the app container.
Always use modern button styles like pill-shaped, or sharp button with interaction animations.
NEVER use AI assistant Emoji characters for icons.
Use 2-3x more spacing than feels comfortable.
Prioritize using pre-existing components from src/components/ui when applicable.
